DOCNAME: CASE OF VEIGA DA SILVA BRAGA v. PORTUGAL
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
JUDGES: Iulia Motoc;Marko Bošnjak;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque
TEXT: CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought enforcement proceedings against her former husband before the ORG seeking the payment of child support amounting to MONEY ( ORG ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was notified that her former husband had no attachable assets .
CARDINAL . On DATE the proceedings were extinguished as no attachable assets were specified pursuant to LAW ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) .
